entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Normandin 12:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Humidity: 44 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
